ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] new wiki page: Http Methods Support
ygData.msgSnippet: BTW, I should also mention that I think that Tim s solution is good enough .  Tunneling is bad, but tunneling uniform semantics ( delete ) makes it bearable.

BTW, I should also mention that I think that Tim's solution is
"good enough".  Tunneling is bad, but tunneling uniform semantics
("delete") makes it bearable.  As long as PUT and DELETE are also
supported, I'm happy.
